topic.title: Symphonies
topic.body:
What are your favourite symphonies?
⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀
Mine are:
Tchaikovsky's 6th symphony ⠀⠀⠀ [magnet](magnet:?xt=urn:btih:B7F6369A101C25D186760AF1CF0E6CAD46CDD48B&tr=http://bt3.t-ru.org/ann?magnet)
Mozart's 41th symphony⠀ ⠀⠀  ⠀  [magnet](magnet:?xt=urn:btih:9CEA4DB5C518221DAEA20471EF5E26D164D9C02E&tr=http://bt3.t-ru.org/ann?magnet)

1565337741_16vtDQkRKY8atc9K3oCBTvMW1ojLL.body:
> [theosis](#comment_35_149W17bFN1NbQou6iE81Uq2b8wEvyqwUV1): What exactly do you download that takes up space? My data folder takes up 400mb and I have 2tb ssd so it doesn't really matter. Who cares? Disk space is dirt cheap nowadays.

idk but after a few hours of browsing 08ch it easily grows to 2GB

1565819093_1J6JfEeFfwmkogEHaMgs8MohbzpzM.body:

Theese?  ->⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀

I used "blank symbols" for formatting
https://www.compart.com/en/unicode/U+2800

> [styromaniac](#comment_985_16NS3rBdW9zpLmLSQoD8nLTtNVsRFtVBhd): [Title of Hyperlink](URL) [...]

Oh it actually has markdown formatting. My bad.

I recently re-listened Mahler's 'Symphony of Thousand' in different performances. I like these two recordings in particular:
Solti ([invidio.us](https://www.invidio.us/watch?v=58fKby1c76E))
Gergiev & LSO

> [numismatist](#comment_38_1F8BHc6FztvWRy9cttVXLj22DSSvMdbGy): I really like Pictures At An Exhibition, I own a half dozen performances of that one.

I had been going to a local public concerto when I read your reply and "Pictures" were actually played there. What a coincidence XD

1566141722_12wsdvQbd5L9bTBKXGgYazbFcHNeg.body: It would be great if there actually was a *censored* kopykate alternative without porn & gore. Or at least the one that would require users to tag these videos nsfw.
